movie.title: Magnolia
movie.plot: An epic mosaic of many interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 28 wins & 55 nominations.

events.title: Sydney Barringer is killed while trying to commit suicide
